title: [Health] An analysis of nationally representative data from 325,219 students in 80 countries found that "In total, 84% of students were physically inactive, 37% were sedentary, and 91% met the definition for the concept we are calling languorous behavior [i.e. physical inactivity and/or sedentary behavior]."
[Neuroscience] UCI team uncovers key brain mechanisms for organizing memories in time | Convergence research project integrated neurobiology with data science techniques
